TopicTitle: The new VAB and Space Plane Hangar

Articles.Content: I can't handle it. They are so awesome
Those are some boss buildings man! 0.21 Is gonna be so freaking epic!

.21 planned for august!

nooooo i cant wait another month!!!!!!
oh lol. new vab/sph. why you need them? best idea - black background, your rocket/plane, and nothing more

Still not impressed. Let's wait for 0.21 to come out, then we'll see what's what.

I don't have orgasms over graphic overhauls to be honest.
And the clouds will be there in game play or just in VAB/SPH?
Clouds will be static in VAB only, apparently sort of a small test for when clouds are implemented in the real game.

Maybe its the angles... but those shots kinda capture the majesty and scale of rocket design.

Beautiful!
I think KSP will soon turn into Crysis.
OMG! The VAB and SPH is so big and tall... I can't wait for the 0.21 to be released!

I think KSP will soon turn into Crysis.

not quite true, Crysis still kills modern PCs built to run newer games at 1600 FPS.

(The hyperbole is strong with this one)

not quite true, Crysis still kills modern PCs built to run newer games at 1600 FPS.

(The hyperbole is strong with this one)

Mostly because it doesn't make full usage of modern multicore cpu's. True story. And a familiar one, hmmm maybe the comparison is better than you think!
I've never heard of Crysis, but once you talked about it, I think KSP is much more optimized than the past.

Still not impressed. Let's wait for 0.21 to come out, then we'll see what's what.

I don't have orgasms over graphic overhauls to be honest.

You off this thread now, Buzzkill, I Mean Bill Kerman. I love the new VAB/SPH It's amazing, I hope to see some more amazing work.
Why is it that every time I plan on watching a stream and forget about it, something important happens?
Loving the new visuals, really driving home the feeling that this game is nearing completion.

Loving the new visuals, really driving home the feeling that this game is nearing completion.

Uh, I would not even come close to saying the game is "near completion" or will be soon.

And personally I hope they take all the time they need to do it right.

Uh, I would not even come close to saying the game is "near completion" or will be soon.

And personally I hope they take all the time they need to do it right.

Oh me too, that's why I said it is "nearing completion" as in it is becoming a lot more polished. I too hope they take all the time with the game that they need.

Loving the new visuals, really driving home the feeling that this game is nearing completion.

Crysis fan? nearing completion = fixed bugs, say "NO" to WOW pictures in monitor:D
Mind = blown
Looks impressive, but with stunning visuals comes severe lag time. Example; windows.

Looks impressive, but with stunning visuals comes severe lag time. Example; windows.

On the stream, they said that the new buildings are actually less resource-consuming. So it's an optimization as well.

And pretty! They also seem much bigger now.
It looks awesome. Great job:D

@AustralianFries

Advice from an old guy, pull out beard first. It grows back.........
